definition[0]: a soft sweet food made from fruit juice and gelatin
definition[1]: a thick sweet substance made from boiled fruit and sugar with no pieces of fruit in it, eaten especially on bread
example[1]: a peanut butter and jelly sandwich
definition[2]: a soft solid substance made from meat juices and gelatin
definition[3]: a substance that is solid but very soft, and moves easily when you touch it
example[3]: frogsâ€™ eggs floating in a protective jelly
